title: Development of Teaching Strategies through Cultural Script Analysis in Mongolian Language Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics teaching experience and understanding of multicultural education
context.additional_context: Current practitioners analyze Mongoliaâ€™s cultural educational characteristics and apply them to mathematics teaching methods through project-based tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three core elements of the Mongolian classroom cultural script (e.g., fast-paced progression, teacher-centered structure).
Learners can design two instructional strategies applicable to math classes based on cultural analysis results.
Learners can improve developed instructional strategies with over 80% feasibility through peer feedback and formative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
